title: Primož Roglič’s New Crew? Bora-Hansgrohe Hunts Jumbo-Visma Coach, Renews Domestiques
content:
Reports indicate Jumbo-Visma trainer Marc Lamberts will join Roglič and his Tour de France quest in 2024.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič’s New Crew? Bora-Hansgrohe Hunts Jumbo-Visma Coach, Renews Domestiques on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
